title: Method that traverses numbers - describe behavior

content.question: Which of the following best describes the behavior of the method?

choices.label: It returns  false  if  numbers  is sorted from least to greatest and returns  true  otherwise.
It returns  false  if  numbers  is sorted from greatest to least and returns  true  otherwise.
It returns  true  if  numbers  is sorted from least to greatest and returns  false  otherwise.
It returns  true  if  numbers  is sorted from greatest to least and returns  false  otherwise.

content.answer: It returns  true  if  numbers  is sorted from greatest to least and returns  false  otherwise.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
